Snoop Dogg On Painting: “The Blunt is Inspiration to the Creation”

posted by Graham on November 10, 2014 in Uncategorized

When Snoop Dogg paints, he needs more than just a blunt. Tennis balls and water guns are lined up alongside paintbrushes, aerosols, and paint balloons by the time Snoop goes to work. The resulting canvases are “the visions I see in my head…a better depiction of who I am and what I’m going through.”

Snoop and the Swedish company Happy Socks created a video to commemorate their new partnership. Snoop didn’t just pick up a brush yesterday. Back in February, one of his canvases went for $10,200 (profits went to the Leukemia Foundation). So when the time came, Happy Socks gave Snoop whatever he wanted, and created some amazing gifs in the process.
